```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(mdsr)
library(RMySQL)
imdb <- dbConnect_scidb(dbname = "imdb")
```


## OPTIONS FOR TOPIC
- [] underrepresentation of women in blockbuster films (highest grossing of all time)
- [] ratings of films vs gender distribution of characters
- [] combination of both? looking at highest rated and blockbuster films and seeing how many are female led


```{r filters}
#filter for english language
SELECT *
FROM imdb.movie_info
WHERE info_type_id = 4
AND info = 'English';

#filter for 21st Century
SELECT * 
FROM imdb.title t 
where kind_id = 1
and production_year > 1999

#filter for gross
SELECT *
FROM imdb.movie_info
WHERE info_type_id = 107;
```

```{r}
SELECT *
FROM imdb.title t 
join imdb.movie_info m on t.id = m.movie_id
group by movie_id
having m.info_type_id = 4 
and m.info like '%English%'
and kind_id = 1;
and t.production_year > 1999;
```
